title: Music Of Honduran Singer Aurelio Rooted In Uplifting, Preserving His Culture
teaser: Known only by his first name, Honduran singer Aurelio has been making music for a decade. Yet, Aurelio is not only known for his raspy voice and catchy cumbia melodies, but for his tireless work promoting the rights of his own people â€” the Garifuna. Now, the former parliament member is out with his latest album Landini.
